column10: Date approximate. Reported to non emergency police of Herndon, two cars ran through stop sign headed north on grace street while my family with stroller was crossing Grace St on the bike path. I think there is a sign in front of the stop sign that obscures stop sign and a street lamp that shines brightly behind the line of site of stop sign.
column21: Stop sign for traffic headed north on Grace st across w and od trail May be obscured by another sign and backlit by lamppost
